import {css} from "emotion";
 
import {unitMath,applyUnitIfRequired} from "../../../utils/css-utils";
import styleMemoize from "../../../utils/style-memoize";
import flaggedStyles from "../../../utils/flagged-styles";
// import {unitMath} from "../../utils/css-utils";
import getMenuVars from "../menu/menu.var";
 
export default styleMemoize(function(flags = []) {
 
  const menuVars = getMenuVars();
 
  const {
    textLineHeight,
    boxShadow,
  } = menuVars;
 
  const thumbBaseSize = applyUnitIfRequired(textLineHeight,"em");
 
  function thumbSizeStyle(thumbSize) {
 
    const size = unitMath(thumbBaseSize,"*",thumbSize);
 
    return css`
 
      .thumb {
 
        width: ${size};
        height:${size};
 
      }
 
      .icon {
        font-size:${size};
        width:1em;
        line-height:1em;
        height:1em;
        vertical-align:top;
        margin:0;
        >svg {
          display:block;
          padding: 15%;
        }
      }
    `;
  }
 
  return flaggedStyles("listview-thumb",flags,{
 
    _: ()=>(css`
 
      flex: 0 0 auto;
 
 
      .thumb {
        display:block;
        background-position:center;
        background-repeat:no-repeat;
        background-size:cover;
      }
 
      ${thumbSizeStyle(2.5)}
 
    `),
 
    bordered: ()=>(css`
      .thumb {
        box-shadow:${boxShadow};
      }
    `),
 
    rounded: ()=>(css`
      .thumb {
        border-radius:10%;
      }
    `),
 
    contained: ()=>(css`
      .thumb {
        background-size:contain;
      }
    `),
 
    mini: thumbSizeStyle.bind(null,1),
 
    tiny: thumbSizeStyle.bind(null,1.5),
 
    small: thumbSizeStyle.bind(null,2),
 
    large: thumbSizeStyle.bind(null,3),
 
    big: thumbSizeStyle.bind(null,4),
 
    huge: thumbSizeStyle.bind(null,5),
 
  });
 
});
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Wed Jan 16 2019 18:48:12 GMT+0000 (GMT)
